name: 04_Calories: Verify the nutrient should not be added/edited after clicking on Cancel/Close button on Add Nutrient Dialog box. -- @1.1

steps.name: And I click on Continue button
And I click on Add Nutrient button on Home page
And I verify "Carbs" got added with value "2.5" on Nutrients Dashboard
And I update the "Carbs" value as "2.2"
And I click on Close button to cancel the Nutrient value updates
And I verify "Carbs" got added with value "2.5" on Nutrients Dashboard
And I update the "Carbs" value as "2.2"
And I click on Cancel button to cancel the Nutrient value updates
And I verify "Carbs" got added with value "2.5" on Nutrients Dashboard

fullName: 02_Calories Calculation functionality: 04_Calories: Verify the nutrient should not be added/edited after clicking on Cancel/Close button on Add Nutrient Dialog box.
